FuncDef: This command enables Fast Channel Change (FCC) for a multicast bundle or channel. Additional parameters such asfcc-channel-typeshould also be configured to match the characteristics of the bundle/channel.

ParaDef.Info: Explicitly disables the FCC server within the policy. For the default bundle within the default multicast information policy, the no form of the command and the disable keyword have the same meaning and imply that the server is disabled.
